channel.title: VR on Cattleguard Blog
channel.description: Recent content in VR on Cattleguard Blog

item.title: Kickstarting Conversation With Sarcastic Programming
item.description: While killing time on Twitter the other day a Techlahoma tweet featuring WebVR and A-Frame grabbed my attention. If you know me, Iâ€™ve been excited about VR and AR for sometime (despite not having any VR or AR capable equipment). So, a color changing sphere that bounces is still fairly fun for me. A-Frame makes creating WebVR experiences extremely accessible. This could be great for artists and those who might otherwise miss out on the medium.
